sentences.sContent: Boeing's research in India will break new ground in aero structures, aerodynamics and electronic networks with a team of senior researchers, scientists and engineers.
sentences.sContent_eng: Boeing's research in India will break new ground in aero structures, aerodynamics and electronic networks with a team of senior researchers, scientists and engineers.
sentences.sCn: 在印度，波音公司将与资深研究人员、科学家和工程师一起开创印度航空构造学、空气动力学以及电子网络的新天地。

synos.tran: 航空的；[航]飞机的；飞行的
